name: 8th International Conference on Advances in Engineering
content: 8th International Conference on Advances in Engineering (AE 2024) April 27 \~ 28, 2024, Copenhagen, Denmark https://cirsy2024.org/ae/index Scope & Topics 8th International Conference on Advances in Engineering (AE 2024) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications impacts and challenges of all Engineering fields. The conference documents practical and theoretical results which make a fundamental contribution for the development of all Engineering. Original research papers, state- of-the-art reviews are invited for publication in all areas of Engineering. Topics of interest include, but are not limited to the following: • Aerospace Engineering • Automotive Engineering • Biomedical Engineering • Chemical Engineering • Civil Engineering • Electrical and Electronic Engineering • Environmental Engineering • Food Sciences • Geomatic Engineering • Interdisciplinary Engineering • Manufacturing Engineering • Materials Engineering • Mechanical Engineering • Metallurgical and Materials Engineering • Ocean Engineering • Other Engineering Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by April 13 , 2024\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by International Journal on Cybernetics & Informatics (IJCI) series (Confirmed). Selected papers from AE 2024, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journal. • Mechanical Engineering: An International Journal (MEIJ) • Circuits and Systems: An International Journal (CSIJ) • Emerging Trends in Electrical, Electronics & Instrumentation Engineering: An international Journal (EEIEJ) • Advanced Energy: An International Journal (AEIJ) • Integrated Optics and Lightwave : an International Journal (OPTLJ) • Advances in Materials Science and Engineering : An International Journal (MSEJ) • International Journal of Computational Science, Information Technology and Control Engineering (IJCSITCE) • Operations Research and Applications: An International Journal (ORAJ) • Aerospace Engineering: An International Journal (AEROIJ ) • Mechatronics and Applications: An International Journal (MECHATROJ) Important Dates • Submission Deadline : April 13, 2024 • Notification : April 18, 2024 • Final Manuscript Due : April 20, 2024 • Publication Date: Determined by the Editor-in-Chief Contact Us: Here’s where you can reach us : ae@cirsy2024.org (or) aeconfe@gmail.com
